content: looking for an incredibly detailed and illustrated crochet pattern to make a gorgeous ribbed colour block crochet beanie look no further this pattern is perfect for the whole family coming in 9 sizes from nb to large adult i also have a separate listing for both the hayden beanie and matching hayden booties as a discounted bundle not only does this pattern include instructions for both a vertical and horizontal colour block pattern but it also provides lots of tips and tricks for seamless colour changes and the best part it s a great beginner pattern worked flat with no increases or decreases written in english using us crochet terminology this pattern is available for instant pdf download for the crochet hayden beanie all you need is dk weight acrylic wool and a 4 5mm hook pom poms are optional with a skill level of beginner - easy you will just need to know how to work in flat row slip_stitch and work in the back loop of a stitch and don t worry the pattern includes many pictures gauge abbreviation keys stitch counts and extra notes to help explain please note that this listing is not a finished product and there will be no refund for purchases made in error if you have any questions about the pattern don t hesitate to contact us start crocheting today and create a beautiful beanie for yourself or your loved ones -----------instant download link will be emailed to you once payment has cleared please ensure you check your junk mail before contacting me --------------- the pattern and photographs contained in this document are property of peach&paige this pattern is available for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is allowed you may sell the finished product credit to peach&paige must be given for the pattern
